subject: Newbie - How to test Login functionality for example ? - URGENT !!!
msgSnippet: Hi all I have a page where I have a familiar Login screen. I am able to test the links and other default values using httpunit. But when I supply an username
messageBody:
Hi all

I have a page where I have a familiar Login screen. I am able to test
the links and other default values using httpunit. But when I supply
an username and Password and do a Submit through httpunit,it doesn't
work.
( I confirmed this with the response object returned which had the
details of the login page itself and not the new page which I had to
get after login )
Here is the sample code :

WebRequest request;
WebResponse response;
WebConversation conversation = new WebConversation();
request = new GetMethodWebRequest
( "http://www.mypage.com:7057/index.jsp" );
response = conversation.getResponse( request );
WebForm[] loginForm = response.getForms();
SubmitButton[] submitButton = loginForm[1].getSubmitButtons();
request = loginForm[1].getRequest(submitButton[0],6,7);
request.setParameter("username","sdgsd");
request.setParameter("password","sdgsdgsdg");
response = conversation.getResponse( request );
loginForm = response.getForms();

KIndly let me know whether you can test this with Catus or httpunit.
On Submit,a Servlet is being called

Thanks
Anand
